name: e-commerce-ai-platform
description: 电商AI自动化平台 - Docker容器化Web应用

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter scripts-service dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter scripts-service build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend start" "pnpm --filter scripts-service start" "pnpm --filter frontend start"
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter scripts-service lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter frontend type-check && pnpm --filter backend type-check && pnpm --filter scripts-service type-check
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter frontend clean && pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter scripts-service clean
